Package net.usikkert.kouinject

Contains the classes and interfaces making up the IoC container.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BeanDataHandler The is the interface for finding beans handled by the IoC container, and meta-data for those beans.
BeanLoader Interface for the main IoC component, the component that loads beans and autowires the dependencies.
ClassLocator Interface for finding classes.
 

Class Summary
AnnotationBasedBeanDataHandler This bean-data handler uses annotations to find beans and extract their meta-data.
BeanData This class describes the bean meta-data needed to instantiate a new bean to a consistent state.
ClassPathScanner Finds classes by scanning the classpath.
DefaultBeanLoader Default implementation of the BeanLoader.
 

Enum Summary
ComponentScope Describes the scope a component has in the container.
 

Package net.usikkert.kouinject Description

Contains the classes and interfaces making up the IoC container.

Author:
Christian Ihle
